body:
@fpapon - I've [created a JIRA issue](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/SHIRO-722).

Please tell me what to do with the failing test and I'll do it.

@fpapon @boris-petrov Agreed,

Your best bet is to overload the existing method with a new one, and just make the old call the new with the previous default (null or NONE, I'm guessing?)
Do we want `NONE` as the default? Chrome is making `LAX` the default and that is more secure than `NONE`. Perhaps Shiro should do the same?

Also, what about the added methods? The test is failing because of that also. I can overload the `buildHeaderValue` and call the new one from the old one, that's fine, but what about the two new methods - `getSameSite` and `setSameSite`?
@boris-petrov for me the `getSameSite` and `setSameSite` are not a problem.

Thanks!

Checked out quickly other PRs, seems they miss tests on user beans with a normal scope and producers should likely be active only if not overriden by the user (otherwise they should be vetoed).
Also I think that cdi2 can simplify the extension and it can be acceptable to skip cdi1 now.
Happy to take some time to do a proposal if it makes sense.

Side note: being asf we should test with owb first I guess ;)
@rmannibucau thanks for take a look! I agree to skip cdi1 and also to test with owb as it's an asf project ;)
@bdemers have you some additional check to do on this one? I think we could merge it.
